message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to invest in this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1025000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to offer you the product for $975000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $925000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $950000, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is the best price I can offer. If you're willing to meet me at $950000, I'm willing to make the deal.
